item.title: India braces for export shock as US tariffs take effect
item.description: India faces a major challenge as a steep U.S. tariff on Indian products takes effect

item.title: Asian shares post modest gains after Wall Street nears more records
item.description: Shares are moderately higher in Asia after an afternoon push left major indexes on Wall Street just below their recent records

item.title: Ukrainian drone attacks on oil refineries have some Russian regions running on empty
item.description: Gas stations have run dry in some regions of Russia after Ukrainian drones struck refineries and other oil infrastructure in recent weeks

item.title: Trump administration is investing in US rare earths in a push to break China's grip
item.description: The U.S. is ramping up efforts to boost production of crucial components used in electric vehicles, smartphones and fighter jets

item.title: Trump administration threatens some funding for 3 states for not enforcing trucker English rules
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says California, Washington and New Mexico could lose millions of dollars of federal funding if they continue fail...
